title: Tianjun Hou
text:
Tianjun Hou studies financial engineering and environmental science. She developed this website to host Environmental, Social, Governance (ESG) resources by R studio and Quarto package when she worked as a graduate assistant at Georgia Tech.


Georgia Institute of Technology, Atlanta, GA
M.S in Quantitative and Computational Finance | Aug 2021 - Dec 2022
Yale University, New Haven, CT
M.S in Environmental Science | Aug 2013 - May 2015
Cornell University, Ithaca, NY
B.S in Environmental Science | Aug 2008 - May 2013



Bank of America | Global Quantitative Summer Analyst | Jun 2022 - present
GW Industry | Investment Analyst | July 2019 - June 2021
Shanghai Fosun High Technology Group | Investment Manager | Nov 2015 - June 2018
